abstract: The chief financial officer of Citigroup, Gary L. Crittenden, warned on Thursday that the bank, the nation’s largest by assets, would suffer more substantial write-downs on debt investments in the second quarter.

headline.main: More Big Write-Downs Loom for Citigroup, Executive Says
